import React,{useContext} from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../Global/CartContext' const Cart = () => { const {shopingCart,totalPrice,qty,dispatch} =useContext(CartContext); return ( <>
{shopingCart.length > 0 ? shopingCart.map(cart=>(
{cart.name} {cart.price} {cart.quantity}
)) :"Sorry the cart is empty..."}
) } export default Cart
